name: Get-A-Head
description:
USE YOUR HEAD!

Play as a silly Dullahan in search of a shiny golden helmet in this puzzling dungeon adventure! Traverse the rooms by activating all the pressure plates to progress.

Submitted to the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together"!

If you enjoyed this game, consider following me on Twitter and Twitch! 

CONTROLS ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️MovementZ/ CPick Up / DropX / VDashCTRL + RReset
